Other Upgrade Removes ads. Supports development. Feedback Share your thoughts. Source Code Let\'s join forces! Contribute your ideas. Licenses Open Source Libraries we \u2665. About App Version
Your schedule at hand Super easy, always your schedule with you. Created with \u2665 by students, for students & teachers of Saxion University of Applied Sciences. Community Designers, developers, creative thinkers and do-ers gather yourselves! Community oriented & opensource code, you decide the next step of this app! Locations Lost? You can now also check your college location.
Please select a default group to finish the introduction. Your device currently doesn\'t support In-App Billing. Try to update Google Play Services.
The theme will be applied after you force reset the Application. Select the schedule you want to load when the App is launched. You will be redirected to our GitHub page. We are looking forward to hear from you! You have successfully upgraded to premium! Thank you for your support. This App is an experimental initiative by Saxion students Jelle ten Brinke & Hugo Olthof. \u2022 Deliver the best Schedule app to our users. \u2022 Learn and innovate by sharing knowledge. \u2022 Encourage Open Source development \u2022 2500+ downloads in the first week after launch. \u2022 We serve an average of 1500 unique users per day with several sessions.
